name: SCP: Invasion
description:
Warning 1: The game is in beta

Warning 2: It's a challenge game

We are a small team developing a game about SCP-354 Red Pool, called SCP: Invasion and we have a development plan consisting of 3 phases:

  • The first is a single-player horror game set in a large open location with a small storyline.
  • The second is the multiplayer (co-op) game about the confrontation between the SCP Foundation members and SCP objects at the Red Pool location where you can choose both sides to play.
  • The third is to support the game and add new content.

Here we introduce the first phase, in which you will have to face all the mysteries that are hidden in the SCP-354 containment zone. You will participate as an MTF patrol unit who experienced an intrusion emergency of an unknown object and left the only one to survive… Or not? 

Replayability: The game offers approximately 15-20 minutes of playtime in one complete run, but as every run is unique and quite challenging, you are able to make it more than one time to have fun! 

If you liked the idea you can support us with any amount you like or play it free. We appreciate that much! But unfortunately we won’t be able to continue the development and make it to the next phase if there’s no support, keep it in mind. 

System requirements: 

Minimal: (For medium settings) RAM: 8 GB GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or higher CPU: Intel Core i5-7300HQ or higher HDD: 11 GB of disk space 

If you have SSD we recommend to install your game there for faster downloads.
